Re : Master Policy Renewal 2024 

 

Good morning, 

 

Given the fact that this mail is subject to French laws and jurisdiction, translating all technical terms from French to English might not be completely accurate as some technicalities are only applicable in France.  

But always Nasco since 65 years is concerned to give our most support and to be able to gain time , you will find below  our free translation.

chunks.text:
Given the fact that this mail is subject to French laws and jurisdiction, translating all technical terms from French to English might not be completely accurate as some technicalities are only applicable in France.  

But always Nasco since 65 years is concerned to give our most support and to be able to gain time , you will find below  our free translation.  

 

First of all, I would like to apologize for the delay in sending  the amendment despite our various reminders to Axa France. 

 

Please find attached amendment no. 3 which amend the ORFEVRERIE CHRISTOFLE Property Damage policy with effect from 01/01/2024:

 

- The compensation period for the Loss of Business guarantee for the YAINVILLE manufacturing plant is reduced from 18 months to 12 months.

 

- Include of the Loss of Business guarantee for shops in all countries in the insured area, the compensation period is 6 months with the exception of China and Canada: compensation period of 12 months. 

 

- Include of the "Green Guarantee" 

 

- New distribution of insured values ​​in the RI 7245 index 

 

- Provisions relating to risks located in Spain 

 

You will find also above  the  file by site and the premium breakdown as of 01/01/2024 following various exchanges by email and in a telephone meeting last March. 

 

It appears that we have: 

 

1.	Proceed to a discount of €9,161.86 including tax for the half-yearly premium from 01/01/24 to 06/30/24

A check will be sent to you directly by Axa France.

chunks.text:
You will find also above  the  file by site and the premium breakdown as of 01/01/2024 following various exchanges by email and in a telephone meeting last March. 

 

It appears that we have: 

 

1.	Proceed to a discount of €9,161.86 including tax for the half-yearly premium from 01/01/24 to 06/30/24

A check will be sent to you directly by Axa France. 

 

2.	The correction of the half-yearly premium invoice from 01/07/24 to 31/12/24 which amounts to €50,945.43 including tax instead of €60,107.25 including tax. 

 

For the update of the insured capital on 01/01/2024, we proceeded as follows:

 

- France, Germany, Spain, United Kingdom: we compared the site-by-site values ​​of the 2023_Values ​​to declare – PAR.xls file of Mrs. Bellec with the values ​​that we had originally. 

 

If the values ​​were identical, we reindexed them because they are historical values ​​dating from 2018 for Yainville and at least 2020 for the other sites, the reindexation takes into account the inflation of replacement/reconstruction costs since 2018. 

 

If the values ​​are different, we reindexed the old values ​​(original values) and added the difference between the new value at the end of 2023 and the original value.

 

- Hong Kong: as our instructions for setting up local policies at the beginning of the year are based on OANDA exchange rates as of 01/01/2024, we applied these exchange rates to the values ​​declared in local currencies.

                

 

The last sites integrated during the year 2024 are not included. They will be on the 2025 file.

metadata.doc_id: C53OZNR - policy axa france master orfevrerie christofle number 10942369104\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
- Hong Kong: as our instructions for setting up local policies at the beginning of the year are based on OANDA exchange rates as of 01/01/2024, we applied these exchange rates to the values ​​declared in local currencies.

                

 

The last sites integrated during the year 2024 are not included. They will be on the 2025 file. 

 

- China: as we had received the capital via the local subsidiary GUFAN, we started from their file (your email of 01/19/24), there is an additional site and the offices are at a new address. 

 

- Canada, USA: we compared the values ​​in local currencies and applied the same method as for France. 

Canada: we maintained a compensation period of 12 months for the 2 stores and not 12 months for Royalmount and 6 months for Montreal because it is too complicated for the management of the local contract and the instructions. 

 

I would be grateful if you could examine (especially page 14 Appendix I which includes the list of insured shops) this amendment and let me know if any amendment must be done.

 

If you agree, I would be also grateful if you could return  stamped and signed by return email and  the transfer of the premium due for the period from 01/07/2024 to 31/12/2024 of € 50,945.43 including tax 

 

I remain at you entire r disposal for any questions and or info needed.

 

All the best 

 

 

Joe Nasr

Head of General Insurance

 



We do everything we can to make your life easier and find solutions  

 

Nasco France

171 rue de Buzenval, 92380 Garches

T +33 1 47 95 97 12   F +33 1 47 95 24 56

This quote is subject to sanctions screening and the clearance by Nasco that there are no sanctions against any party that is covered under this risk and any party related thereto that has an interest in such risk*.

If any sanctions matches are identified then this quote is void and, regardless of whether such quote has been accepted or not, Nasco will not be bound to offer or agree to enter into any contract.

This sanction disclaimer applies not only if a party is itself sanctioned but also in respect of the inability to pay for any direct or indirect sanction. 

 

*and in respect of marine cargo cover, this is subject to ensuring the cargo is not subject to an export control restriction from the country of export to the destination country or to the receiving party and, ensuring the act of carrying the cargo will not in itself trigger a risk of being subject to sanctions.
